title: Seduced at Midnight
description: The Ladies Literary Society of London gathers again for a ghost story... Lady Julianne Bradley has always longed for wild adventure. Unfortunately, the man with whom she wishes to share her fervor can never be hers. Tormented by her desire, she's preparing for a suitable marriage when ghostly occurrences straight out of her latest read start happening - and to protect Julianne, her father hires the very man her heart cries out for.
author: Jacquie D'Alessandro
